caption: Anatomy lecture ticket issued by the University of Glasgow for Practical Anatomy and Anatomical Demonstrations given by Allen Thomson MD. Ticket was issued 6 November 1860 and good for six months. Ticket was issued to Mr. James Macdonald. Ticket also confirms Macdonald attended demonstrations very regularly and performed dissection. Ticket is signed 23 April 1861 under the name Allen Thomson, although authenticity of this signature cannot be verified.
